existing_features.title: Create a single-page, fully responsive portfolio website in the existing React + TypeScript frontend that matches a futuristic, cyberpunk-inspired dark theme with neon accents (electric blue, purple, cyan gradients), including glassmorphism surfaces, glowing borders, bold tech-style typography, and consistent spacing/layout across all sections.

Implement a Hero section that prominently displays: Name (Mitul Patel), Title (Senior Android Developer), Experience (6+ Years), Location (Ahmedabad, India), and includes an animated call-to-action button set for “Download Resume” and a second CTA for “Contact Me”, plus animated Android-inspired visuals.
Add an About section containing the provided summary text and present it in a glassmorphism card style with subtle scroll-in animation.
Create a Technical Skills section that showcases all provided skills using animated skill bars and/or glowing tech cards, with hover/tap micro-interactions and staggered entrance animations.
Create an Experience section as a futuristic vertical timeline with a glowing line and nodes, containing the three roles and dates exactly as provided.

Create a Projects section with interactive project cards (hover effects, glow, slight tilt/lift) for: Tree Garden (100K+ downloads), Social Duels (100K+ downloads), Ice Park (10K+ downloads), Givvy Bird (100K+ downloads), Givvy Videos (5M+ downloads), Frekis (BLE-based app). Each card must include: a short description, role & contributions, tech used, and a highlighted download stats element.
Add animated background effects that match the cyberpunk theme, including floating geometric shapes and particle effects, ensuring performance is acceptable on mobile devices.
Implement smooth scrolling navigation between sections and section reveal animations/micro-interactions across the page (buttons, cards, inputs), keeping animations subtle and consistent.
Add an Animated Statistics Counter section featuring at minimum “30+ Apps Developed” with a neon/glow presentation and count-up animation when scrolled into view.

Create a Contact section with glowing input fields (focus glow, glassmorphism styling) and include social media icon buttons with hover glow effects. Provide a functional contact action (e.g., a mailto link) without requiring external services.

Generate and include required static visual assets for the cyberpunk portfolio (Android-inspired hero graphic and subtle geometric background shapes) and render them from the frontend as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.

Generate a square, face-focused profile image crop from the uploaded photo "ChatGPT Image Jan 20, 2026, 07_58_51 PM.png" and add it to the frontend as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.

Set the uploaded image "ChatGPT Image Feb 13, 2026, 11_28_35 AM.png" as the hero header image by optimizing it for web use, adding it under frontend/public/assets/generated, and updating the hero visual in frontend/src/components/portfolio/HeroSection.tsx to render this new header image instead of the current android-hero image.
Update the Hero section experience label to display "8+ Years of Experience" instead of "6+ Years of Experience".

Update the Contact section to use the email address "md.ghoda@gmail.com" for (1) the displayed contact email in the Contact Information card and (2) the mailto recipient used when submitting the contact form.
Add the contact phone number "+91 9408861420" to the Contact Information card in the Contact section (alongside the existing email and location).

Update the Contact section social links so that GitHub points to "https://github.com/mitulghoda" and LinkedIn points to "https://www.linkedin.com/in/mitulpatel1991". If any social icon remains without a real URL, remove it from the rendered social links list.
